head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths BANNON, WILLIAM A.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths BANNON, WILLIAM A.

block.p: BANNON-William A. on May 8, 2000 of Mattituck, formerly of Flatbush. World War II D Day Army veteran. Beloved husband of the late Muriel. Devoted father of Dennis and the late William. Also survived by three grandchildren and two great grandchildren. Reposing at the Willaim F. Coster Funeral Home, Main Rd., route 25, Cutchogue, New York, Wednesday and Thursday 2 PM to 4 PM and 7 PM to 9 PM. Funeral Mass 11 AM, Friday at Our Lady of Good Cousel Church, Mattituck. Burial to follow in Sacred Heart Cemetery. Memorials may be sent to East End Hospice.
